channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20775] Factor cost of each SJ reduction when costing a follow-up reduction
item.description: Currently, while costing the SJ in a plan, the stats of the a TS that is reduced by a SJ are not adjusted after we have decided to keep a SJ in the tree. Ideally, we could adjust the stats to take into account decisions that have already been made.
item.summary: Factor cost of each SJ reduction when costing a follow-up reduction

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
